jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Ground up application development on a new product using React JS, Node JS, GraphQL, and TypeScript.

bullets: Worked with the CRIPT team to build the data visualization portion of the CRIPT application.

Architect, design, and develop SSO app to centralize user login across applications.
Build a reusable component library to speed up the development process and phase out unreliable/unsecure third party components.

jobs.title: Javascript Developer
bullets: Assist contracted teams in design and development of the new Ecomm website platform.
Advise leadership on technical decisions in the design and development process as well as accessibility and SEO concerns.
Use ReactJS, MongoDB, NodeJS, and Express to create Web applications to automate and speed up workflows throughout the company.
Maintain Linux server on the intranet that hosts the suite of applications.
Created KitBuilder: to quickly aggregate multiple products into a single kit and upload it to our cloud server.

Created ImageBot: upload multiple images instantly and the bot will analyze the image names and compare them with matched products and sort them Into the correct image attributes. The bot will also clean other image data during the scan process to slowly perfect our data structure.
Created QA submission: a web app that runs on a tablet and auto generates information and performs automatic calculations to drastically increase the speed of the product quality assurance process.
